description: Navi-xtreme exists for one purpose - to add content to Navi-X, the (IMHO) best media-portal script for XBMC. It makes it easy for you to share your media links with the world while constantly auto-removing dead links.
author: Fábio Ferreira (facanferff), lprot
title: Navi-X
synopsis: Navi-X is a content aggregator app that provides access to all kinds of multimedia content, listed on a public directory of user contributed listings or playlists for playing on your TV or PC!
